text: Emma Ritoók or Ritoók Emma (15 July 1868 – 3 April 1945) was a poet, critic and philosopher. ==Life== Ritoók was born in Nagyvárad in what was then Austria-Hungary, and is now Oradea in Romania. She was a member of the Budapest philosophical discussion group "Sunday Circle". She died in Budapest, Hungary in 1945. ==References== Category:1868 births Category:1945 deaths Category:People from Oradea Category:Hungarian women poets Category:20th- century Hungarian poets Category:20th-century Hungarian women writers
title: Emma Ritoók
